title: Steps
description: The Steps component is designed to visually represent a multi-step process. It supports both horizontal and vertical layouts, making it perfect for onboarding, wizards, and process visualizations.

body.raw:
# Steps Component Documentation The **Steps** component provides a structured way to represent a multi-step process. It supports both horizontal and vertical layouts, making it ideal for onboarding flows, wizards, and process visualizations. ## Preview and Code Snippet Preview Code Step 1: Fork the Repository

Visit our GitHub repository and click the "Fork" button to create your own copy.

Fork the Repository on GitHub
Step 2: Clone the Repository

Use the following command to clone the repository to your local machine:

git clone https://github.com/your-repo/example.git
 Step 3: Install Dependencies

Navigate into the project directory and run:

npm install
 ```tsx import { Steps, Step, StepTitle, StepContent } from "@/components/steps"; export default function Example() { return ( Step 1: Fork the Repository

Visit our GitHub repository and click the "Fork" button to create your own copy.

Fork the Repository on GitHub
Step 2: Clone the Repository

Use the following command to clone the repository to your local machine:

git clone https://github.com/your-repo/example.git
 Step 3: Install Dependencies

Navigate into the project directory and run:

npm install
 ); } ``` ## Props | Prop | Type | Default | Description | | ------------------ | -------------------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | | `contentPosition` | `"right" \| "below"` | `"below"` | Defines whether the content appears to the right or below. | | `className` | `string` | `""` | Custom class for styling the steps container. | | `titleClassName` | `string` | `""` | Custom class for styling the step title. | | `contentClassName` | `string` | `""` | Custom class for styling the step content. | | `lineClassName` | `string` | `""` | Custom class for styling the connector line. | | `numberClassName` | `string` | `""` | Custom class for styling the step number circle. | The **Steps** component is highly flexible and allows for styling customization to fit various UI requirements.
